data.text: Sɛdeɛ sukyerɛmma te ahuhuro berɛ anaasɛ osutɔ te wɔ otwa berɛ no
Sɛdeɛ apatuprɛ tuo anaasɛ asomfena tu danedane ne ho no,
Ɔkafoɔ abaa wɔ hɔ ma ɔpɔnkɔ, nnareka wɔ hɔ ma afunumu,
Nhwɛ ɔkwasea agyimisɛm so mma no mmuaeɛ,
Gyina ɔkwasea agyimisɛm so ma no mmuaeɛ
Sɛ wode nkra bi soma ɔkwasea a,
Apakye nan a awu na ɛsensɛn hɔ no,
Ɛboɔ a wɔakyekyere afam ahwimmoɔ so,
Nkasɛɛ dua a ɛkura ɔkɔwensani no
Deɛ ɔbɔ ɔkwasea anaa obi hunu paa no
Sɛdeɛ ɔkraman sane kɔ ne feɛ ho no,
Woahunu obi a ɔyɛ onyansafoɔ wɔ nʼankasa ani so?
Ɔkwadwofoɔ ka sɛ, “Gyata wɔ ɛkwan no mu,
Sɛdeɛ ɛpono di akɔneaba wɔ ne mponterɛ so no,
Ɔkwadwofoɔ de ne nsa si aduane mu,
Ɔkwadwofoɔ yɛ onyansafoɔ wɔ ɔno ankasa ani so
Obi a ɔsɔ ɔkraman aso twe noɔ no
Ɔbɔdamfoɔ a ɔtoto atuo
te sɛ obi a, ɔdaadaa ne yɔnko
Yensin hi a, ogya dum;
Sɛdeɛ gyabidie dane gyasramma na anyina dane ogya no,
Osekuni anom asɛm te sɛ mfremfremadeɛ;
Sɛdeɛ wɔde dwetɛ fi adura asankago ho no
Onipa bɔne kasa te sɛ deɛ ɔyɛ,
Ɛwom sɛ ne kasa yɛ dɛ deɛ, nanso ɛnnye no nni,
Ebia nnaadaa bɛkata nʼadwemmɔne so,
Sɛ onipa tu amena a, ɔbɛto mu;
Atorɔ tɛkrɛma kyiri wɔn a ɔgu wɔn ho fi,
